reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and her explanations of complex concepts are crystal clear. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Chen is knowledgeable and approachable. His coding assignments are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Williams knows her stuff, but her lectures can be a bit dry. Office hours are helpful though.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez brings history to life! His passion for the subject is contagious.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's research-based approach is refreshing. Assignments can be tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee rushes through material too quickly. It's hard to keep up in his classes.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Foster's lab sessions are incredibly well-organized and she makes sure everyone understands the experiments. A great professor!

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Clark has a deep understanding of literature and his classes are always thought-provoking. Be prepared to read a lot!

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Adams covers important topics, but her lectures can be a bit monotonous. Participation is key in her class.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Evans is excellent at breaking down complex economic theories into understandable concepts. His real-world examples are particularly helpful.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Brooks is passionate about political science and her enthusiasm makes the class enjoyable. The discussions are engaging and thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Turner knows his philosophy, but his lectures can be a bit abstract. More concrete examples would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's classes are incredibly insightful and she encourages deep thinking. The readings are challenging but worth it.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is dedicated to his students and passionate about environmental issues. His classes are informative and eye-opening.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Davis knows the material well, but her teaching style can be hard to follow at times. The labs are well-structured, though.

reviews.subject: Business Management
reviews.review: Prof. Harris brings real-world experience into the classroom, making his lectures practical and insightful. The case studies are particularly valuable.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Moore's passion for art history is evident in her lectures. She makes even the most ancient pieces feel relevant today.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Allen is knowledgeable, but his teaching style is very traditional. More interactive lessons would be appreciated.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. White's lectures are engaging and full of real-world examples. She genuinely cares about her students' understanding of the material.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. King makes statistics understandable and interesting. His examples are clear, and his problem sets are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Peterson's lectures are very technical and hard to follow without a strong background in physics. More examples would help.
